stories.fantasy_headline: Dream Weavers Enchant Slumber to Spark New Ideas!
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Dream Weavers' Guild has discovered a magical way to influence the visions of sleeping folk. By using subtle, enchanted melodies during deep slumber, they can guide dreams toward certain thoughts. This enchanting technique promises to boost creativity among bards and artisans throughout the kingdom.

stories.fantasy_headline: Master Alchemist Joins Grand Order of Arcane Intelligence!
stories.fantasy_story: Master Peter of Steinberger Keep, the revered founder of the OpenClaw Artificers, has pledged his service to the Grand Order of Arcane Intelligence. It is said he brings wondrous ideas for how enchanted golems can work together. This alliance promises a future filled with many collaborating constructs across the realms.
